channel.title: Expanding/closing question
channel.description:
I have something like this
on a column on the left side of a site I am working on.
-blah -blah -blah -blah -blah
What I want it to do though is if I click one of the fields it will expand it two more. such as
-blah --blah --blah -blah -blah -blah
and then you can also click after it is expanded to make it shut/close the expansion.

item.title: Expanding/closing question
item.dc:creator: @Zeanr Zeanr
item.description:
@Zeanr wrote:

Simple. All you need is jQuery, not sure if it’s obtainable using CSS.

First, in your section add this:

Second make a new javascript file called jQueryToggle.js. Add it to your section.

Third add this in the javascript file you just made:

$(document).ready(function(){ $("#clickBox").click(function(){ $("#showBox").slideToggle(); }); }); });

And you’re done. If you need any additional help, shoot me a pm.

Read full topic
